name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Purple
description:
Basado en el videojuego superventas creado por Scott Cawthon, Five Nights at Freddy's: Purple te mostrará la historia de William Afton, un padre de familia que verá su vida derrumbarse, mientras intenta mantener un negocio junto a su socio Henry Stein. Tus decisiones afectarán a la narrativa, y a cuánta destrucción habrá en Freddy's. ¿Podrás resolver el enorme misterio de Freddy's, o acabarás convertido en el monstruo que estás destinado a ser?

Para jugar, descarga el .zip, extráelo y abre el archivo "Five Nights at Freddy's Purple". NO BORRES TUS DATOS DEL NAVEGADOR, O PERDERÁS TU PARTIDA GUARDADA.

Based on the best-selling video game created by Scott Cawthon, Five Nights at Freddy's: Purple will show you the story of William Afton, a family man who will see his life fall apart as he tries to maintain a business with his partner Henry Stein. Your decisions will affect the narrative, and how much destruction there will be at Freddy's. Will you be able to solve the enormous mystery of Freddy's, or will you end up becoming the monster you are destined to be?

To play, download the .zip file, extract it and open the "Five Nights at Freddy's Purple" file. DO NOT DELETE YOUR BROWSER DATA, OR YOU WILL LOSE YOUR SAVE GAME.
